summary: A British woman trying to escape Hungary with her freedom fighter lover and a group of Westerners, as the Soviet Union moves to crush the Hungarian Revolution of 1956, finds herself the obsession of an enigmatic Communist officer.
cast: Deborah Kerr|Yul Brynner|Jason Robards|Robert Morley|E.G. Marshall|Anne Jackson|Ron Howard|Flip Mark|Kurt Kasznar|David Kossoff|Gérard Oury|Marie Daëms|Anouk Aimée|Barbara von Nady|Maurice Sarfati|Siegfried Schürenberg|Maria Urban|Jerry Fujikawa|Erica Vaal|Dimitri Fedotoff|Leonid Pylajew|Wolf Neuber|Michael Szekely|Charles Regnier|Iván Petrovich|Ernst Konstantin|Senta Berger|Michael Janisch|Fred Roby
title: Rojo atardecer
